overview: Today we bring you a group of husbands where jealously is least of their concerns, in fact it’s quite the opposite, these fellas love to watch their wives fuck another man and of course our girls are happy to agree! What better way to celebrate a wedding anniversary than with a DP threesome as Kate Rich starts the party with a bang, literally! There’s Florane Russel, who sure knows how to strengthen business relations as she fucks a client for her boss husband. Meanwhile Katy Rose takes it hard from her husband’s stepbrother in a quality anal scene. And last but not least Tiny Tina’s love for porn see’s her treated to a real life stud to satisfy her needs. These are the stories of Private Specials, Cuckold’s Fantasy, available right now!
title: Cuckolds' Fantasy
